title: How do you Hide the counters in Spectator Mode
body:
In the top right corner of the screen in spectator mode I can see two counters:

_FPS: 80
0 ms_

Is there a way to remove them? I searched through options and there doesn't seem to be a way. 

Thanks for any help in advance.

replies.body:
Hey Nijiyo,

If I recall correctly, you can use CTRL+F while spectating (or in-game) to show/hide that information.
